snippet.title: The Eternal Life of Goldman - Yasunori Nishiki Announcement Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative
snippet.description:
Learn more about The Eternal Life of Goldman: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2254950/The_Eternal_Life_of_Goldman/

Prepare for a sonic evolution! We're honored and delighted to introduce our legendary roster of music composers for The Eternal Life of Goldman, who are responsible for orchestrating incredible pieces of auditory art. Please welcome Kevin Penkin (Star Wars: Vision, Made in Abyss, Florence), Mason Lieberman (Overwatch 2, Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical, League of Legends: Wild Rift), Pete Lepley (Wargroove, Sky Rogue), and Yasunori Nishiki (Octopath Traveler, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth) to the mixdown. 

While Nishiki's compositions are yet to grace the world of The Eternal Life of Goldman, we'll immerse him in the vibrant soundscapes of Penkin, Lieberman, and Lepley, showcasing each of their creative approaches and fairy-dusting it with fresh gameplay.
With this collaborative exchange, a symphony of passion, we are sure to ignite Nishiki's creative fire.

Follow news and updates on The Triple-i Initiative:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/triple-i-initiative 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/iii_initiative 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@iii_initiative 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iii_initiative 
Bilibili: https://space.bilibili.com/3546638813497663
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iii_initiative 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the.iii_initiative 

What is the triple-i initiative?

The Triple-i Initiative is a bunch of studios banding together to share exciting news to our players, in a short show packed with back-to-back trailers. That’s it - no extra fluff, no ads, no host, just games. We’re talking world premieres, exclusive gameplay, launch dates, demo drops and more!

You can learn more over on https://iii-initiative.com
